articles.author: Matthew Dalton, Micah Maidenberg
articles.title: European Rocket Launch Takes Aim at SpaceX - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: After years of delays, Europe is preparing to test launch a new rocket that officials hope will help diminish the U.S. company’s dominance

articles.title: Hottest June in human history recorded as Earth continues to bake, data shows - WION
articles.description:
European Union's climate monitor on Monday (Jul 8) revealed that last month was the hottest June on record across the globe. The global average temperature recorded last month broke the previous June record set in 2023. 

Since June last year, the world has b…
